message: Let's split the money 70/30. It's a good deal for you in the first round, Bob!
Alice, my turn. I understand you want a larger share, but let's be reasonable. How about a 60/40 split in your favor? This accounts for the time value and gives us both something.
Bob, time is running out, and the value for you keeps decreasing! I'm offering 65/35.  Take it before it's too late!
Alice, you're right about the time pressure, but I'm also losing value with every passing round.  Let's meet in the middle - 55/45 seems fair considering the circumstances.
Bob, I'm sticking to my previous offer of 60/40.  This is your last chance to get a decent share before inflation eats away even more of your potential gains!
